programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Shares A Good Deed / Paddington Goes Green) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Paddington Shares A Good Deed / Paddington Goes Green»Mr. Gruber does a good turn for Paddington & says he can thank him by passing it on to someone else, which is harder than it sounds!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over) S2 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over»Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et le pigeon) S1 (7/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et le pigeon»Paddington nurses a sick bird named Pigeonton back to health, but can he let him go?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Souvenirs de l'ancien temps) S4 (51/52)
programme.desc: «Souvenirs de l'ancien temps»Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La montagne blanche) S4 (49/52)
programme.desc: «La montagne blanche»Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Chantons sous la pluie tropicale) S5 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Chantons sous la pluie tropicale»City-slicker umbrella sellers Molly and Gil set up shop in the Amazon rainforest, but howler monkeys take all their merchandise! With the help of the other guppies, they use their knowledge of the Amazon to track down their umbrellas.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Feelin' Filipino) S3 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Feelin' Filipino»Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Into the Blueniverse) S3 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Into the Blueniverse»It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race) S9 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race»The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle) S9 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (A Shark Day's Night) S1 (22/28)
programme.desc: «A Shark Day's Night»The Tentacools (Baby, William, and Vola) get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Quesadillas) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Quesadillas»Quesadillas: Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favourite jar of salsa open, no matter how hard he and his friends try! (S1, ep 7b).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf) S9 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf»When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et les plantes) S2 (1/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et les plantes»Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le cours de science) S5 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Le cours de science»Daddy teaches Peppa and George a fun game to play while they wait inside for the rain to stop.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S5 (n°10)
programme.desc: Everyone is excited when Mummy Rabbit arrives with some big news-she is pregnant! Will it be one baby or twins?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pedro le cow-boy) S4 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Pedro le cow-boy»Peppa, George, Suzy Sheep, Wendy Wold and Danny Dog visit Pedro Pony who's pretending to be a cowboy. He welcomes them to his cowboy camp. The group imagine they are in the Wild West and do cowboy things, such as eating beans, singing sings, telling stories and sleeping in the tent at night. But even cowboys can get scared, especially when wild animals are lurking outside the tent. The fun goes on until evening, when Peppa and friends need to go home.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mystery Present) S1 (n°37)
programme.desc: «The Mystery Present»Bubu, Froga and Anna are looking for Anna's Ukulele, a bouncy ball and another item belonging to Froga. When searching, they find a beautiful present. Why is it here? Who is it for? What's inside? Our friends are planning to find out!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Friendship Bouquet) S1 (n°38)
programme.desc: «The Friendship Bouquet»Froga is devastated because her sunflowers have withered in her garden and she cannot make her annual sunflower bouquet. Luckily, Anna, with her friends, searches for a solution to replace Froga's cherished sunflowers with something better!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue s'amuse dans la neige) S3 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Blue s'amuse dans la neige»There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Race to the Top of the World) S2 (4/20)
programme.desc: «Race to the Top of the World»Blaze and his friends compete in the most epic race in history: the Race to the Top of the World! But when Crusher throws them off course, Blaze and his Monster Machine friends must persevere to make it to the finish line.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Poisson légendaire / Bulles à gogo) S1 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Le Poisson légendaire / Bulles à gogo»When Ian is on holidays, Lola takes over as a park ranger for a day, but that is not easy. Mister Staal tries to clean Middenbos with a huge soap machine and creates one big bubble nightmare!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler) S2 (n°10)
programme.desc: «Paddington Opens the City Farm / Paddington the Upcycler»Paddington's excited about the grand opening of the city farm, but the animals escape when the gate is left open - will they find them in time? // Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington au secours des abeilles) S2 (15/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington au secours des abeilles»Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Quesadillas) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Quesadillas»Quesadillas: Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favourite jar of salsa open, no matter how hard he and his friends try! (S1, ep 7b).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Pour maman / Barbacarambolage) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Pour maman / Barbacarambolage»The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Greedyguts / Where is Bali?) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «Greedyguts / Where is Bali?»Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le voeu de l'étoile de mer filante / Le défi du requin) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Le voeu de l'étoile de mer filante / Le défi du requin»Baby and friends set out to climb Wish Mountain and make a wish on the legendary shooting starfish, Ol' Sea Breeze. // Shadow challenges Baby Shark to a Shark-Off to prove who's the sharkiest shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Coral Dilemma) S1 (24/28)
programme.desc: «Coral Dilemma»When Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove, it's up to Super Shark and Captain Kelp to bring it back!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Leaf Portraits) S1 (n°39)
programme.desc: «Leaf Portraits»When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Hiccups) S1 (n°40)
programme.desc: «Hiccups»Froga gets a terrible hiccup, each of her friends come up with creative solutions to help her to get rid of it. No matter how hard they try, though, the hiccups put their patience and good humor to the test!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Treasure Hunt) S1 (n°36)
programme.desc: «The Treasure Hunt»Froga organizes a treasure hunt for her friends! Everyone is enthusiastic, except Ron is not with them. Froga realises the treasure has now disappeared. When the treasure hunters have finally found Ron, they also found him..with the missing treasure!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race) S9 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race»The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle) S9 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle»When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'anniversaire de maman Pig) S1 (21/52)
programme.desc: «L'anniversaire de maman Pig»It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La chasse au trésor) S1 (24/52)
programme.desc: «La chasse au trésor»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Pas très bien) S1 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Pas très bien»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Zero Waste) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Zero Waste»When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Chocolat et boules de neige) S4 (12/20)
programme.desc: «Chocolat et boules de neige»It's a snowy day in Axle City, and every truck in town is lining up for a delicious winter warm-up: hot chocolate! But when Crusher tries to take all the hot chocolate for himself, Blaze is in hot pursuit to get it back!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La fête de la neige) S6 (n°14)
programme.desc: «La fête de la neige»Blaze and AJ help a truck named Snowbie get to the Snow Spectacular in time.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Super-Ruben / Le mambo des Hippos) S3 (7/26)
programme.desc: «Super-Ruben / Le mambo des Hippos»Apollo the Super Pup comes to Adventure Bay, in Rubble's dream. The pups must rescue their super hero!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Danny X le Hardi / Chien robot le dépanneur) S3 (8/26)
programme.desc: «Danny X le Hardi / Chien robot le dépanneur»"When a boy named Danny sees Ryder perform an incredible stunt during a rescue, it inspires him to become a daredevil. When Danny attempts a risky stunt, Ryder and the pups use the Air Patroller for a daring mid-air rescue! // Ryder entrusts the care of Adventure Bay to Robo-Dog while he and the Pups take a well-deserved break. But Robo-Dog goes on a fixing rampage, and Ryder and the Pups must cut their vacation short to save him!".

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Kai Express / Ducknado) S1 (4/15)
programme.desc: «Kai Express / Ducknado»When Kai joins all the deer's carts together, the vehicles end up as a runaway train in the Central Forest! // Sir Steel's super powerful hairdryer creates a giant tornado that sucks up Ian, his ducklings and a heap of other things.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Over the Rainbow) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Over the Rainbow»The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Shares A Good Deed / Paddington Goes Green) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Paddington Shares A Good Deed / Paddington Goes Green»Mr. Gruber does a good turn for Paddington & says he can thank him by passing it on to someone else, which is harder than it sounds!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over) S2 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over»Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Cirque de Peppa) S4 (49/52)
programme.desc: «Le Cirque de Peppa»Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'étang) S4 (50/52)
programme.desc: «L'étang»Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Souvenirs de l'ancien temps) S4 (51/52)
programme.desc: «Souvenirs de l'ancien temps»Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La montagne blanche) S4 (49/52)
programme.desc: «La montagne blanche»Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Chantons sous la pluie tropicale) S5 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Chantons sous la pluie tropicale»City-slicker umbrella sellers Molly and Gil set up shop in the Amazon rainforest, but howler monkeys take all their merchandise! With the help of the other guppies, they use their knowledge of the Amazon to track down their umbrellas.

programme.desc: «Feelin' Filipino»Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.desc: «Into the Blueniverse»It's an interstellar Blue's Clues adventure! Magenta's toy spaceship spins out of control, disappearing into Blueniverse. Where in the Blueniverse is Magenta's spaceship? We'll play Blue's Clues to find out!

programme.desc: «Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race»The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger.

programme.desc: «A Shark Day's Night»The Tentacools (Baby, William, and Vola) get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Quesadillas) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Quesadillas»Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open no matter how hard he and his friends try!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf) S9 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf»When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et les plantes) S2 (1/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington et les plantes»Paddington realizes he has been watering the wrong plant while Mr. Curry is away on holiday!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !) S4 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Le train de Papy Pig à la rescousse !»Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le concours d'animaux) S4 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Le concours d'animaux»Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La toile d'araignée) S4 (22/52)
programme.desc: «La toile d'araignée»Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are in Daddy Pig's study, and they see that it is a complete mess and full of spider webs. They see a spider, which Peppa names Mister Skinnylegs, but Mummy Pig is afraid and tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it. They set out to find a new home for Mister Skinnylegs.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (King for a Day) S1 (n°41)
programme.desc: «King for a Day»Today the friends play King For A Day, someone throws the crown on Christopher's head! Then the crown leaves his head and ends on his cousin, Benjy, who just came for a day visit. Benjy only wants to play with his cousin, and do whatever he wants.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Vegetable Pie) S1 (n°42)
programme.desc: «The Vegetable Pie»Froga's strawberries are sick so she's going to miss this year's vegetable picking. When Bubu offers her a walkie-talkie to use, she agrees to let him baby-sit her sick plant for her. But soon, Froga loses confidence in Bubu's ability to help.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Un super moment avec Blue) S3 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Un super moment avec Blue»Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and play a timely game of Blue's Clues to figure out what special time is coming up.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies) S8 (n°24)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies»Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball) S2
programme.desc: «La chasse aux gros insectes / Le Cerf-ball»Lady Fluffpot hates mini-beasts - and Sir Steel creates MEGA-beasts that the Deer squad must deal with. // Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré»Rammy's tips about focus and meditation come in handy when Mister Staal's Replicator makes donuts rain in Midden Bos. When Kai takes out his Hydropower on an ice cream machine, it turns into an unhinged ice bot!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler) S2 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler»Mr. Curry's & Paddington's favorite radio show is cancelled - how will they ever know the ending now? // Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Mac and Cheese) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Mac and Cheese»Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Barbidur n'est pas en forme / Patience Barbidur...»Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires / Détective Baby Shark) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Un artiste ne baisse jamais les nageoires / Détective Baby Shark»When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine. // When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (A Mail Whale Tale) S1 (n°24)
programme.desc: «A Mail Whale Tale»When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Prank Day) S1 (n°23)
programme.desc: «Prank Day»Today is Prank day, Anna and her friends must compete to elect the best prankster of all. Everyone's doing a great except Christopher. The friends are surprised when the worst prankster turns out to be the best!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Leaf Portraits) S1 (n°39)
programme.desc: «Leaf Portraits»When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Give-Away Day) S1 (n°45)
programme.desc: «Give-Away Day»Froga gets a new beautiful Sunflower Plant and decides to put it in her greenhouse. But she realizes that has been using her greenhouse to store all the items she doesn't know what to do with anymore. Now there's no room for her plant!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Funny Sounds) S1 (n°46)
programme.desc: «Funny Sounds»When he accidentally erases the 3 funny sounds that Christopher had on his recorder, Ron, decides to re-record them with the help of all his friends. But no sound seem to suit Christopher, who has a hard time accepting the loss of them.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Squeaky Boots) S1 (n°66)
programme.desc: «The Squeaky Boots»Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of HIDE AND SEEK. But Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy SQEEEAK. When a pesky mosquito enters the picture and threatens to ruin the winning prize!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Greedy Gobbler) S1 (n°67)
programme.desc: «The Greedy Gobbler»While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! When Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears, the friends are convinced it's the work of the GREEDY GOBBLER and the HAZELNUT PRANKSTERS.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La reine) S4 (27/52)
programme.desc: «La reine»The Queen decided to give out an award for the hardest working person. She announces that the medal will go to Miss Rabbit. She is invited to the Queen's palace for a special ceremony. She takes her friends with her, including Peppa and George. After the ceremony is done they all go to the garden and Peppa shows the Queen just how fun muddy puddles are.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île déserte) S4 (28/52)
programme.desc: «L'île déserte»Peppa and George are at Danny Dog's house and Captain Dog is telling the kids stories of the time when he was a sailor. He declares that he will never step on a boat again. Grandad Dog, Grandpa Pig and Grampy Rabbit are going on a fishing trip and the Captain refuses to join them. But the three of them get lost at sea because no one is steering the boat. They get stranded on a desert island, so Captain Dog has no choice but to get on a boat to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa Pig a perdu ses lunettes) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Papa Pig a perdu ses lunettes»Papa Pig is a bit cranky because he lost his glasses. Peppa and George are going to look for him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jardinage) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Le jardinage»Daddy Loses His Glasses: When Daddy Pig loses his glasses he gets a bit grumpy. But Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for them.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés) S1 (1/52)
programme.desc: «L'arbre de Barbapapa / L'anniversaire des barbabébés»It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Blaze et le génie de la lampe) S4 (18/20)
programme.desc: «Blaze et le génie de la lampe»Blaze and AJ are driving through the desert when they meet a magical Genie who loves to grant wishes! But when the Genie loses the jewels that give him his powers, Blaze and AJ go on a quest to get them back!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Pirate Musical!) S6 (20/23)
programme.desc: «Pirate Musical!»In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le gentil dragon / Les trois petits cochons) S3 (9/26)
programme.desc: «Le gentil dragon / Les trois petits cochons»The Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La Plantae Putridus / Le singe de l'espace) S3 (10/26)
programme.desc: «La Plantae Putridus / Le singe de l'espace»"Mayor Humdinger drops off a 'gift' to Mayor Goodway, a flower that spreads a horrible stink when it blooms.Mayor Goodway tries to return it to him, but runs into trouble and has to be rescued by the Paw Patrol. // A UFO has just splashed down in the bay! When Ryder and the pups pop the hatch, they find a monkey astronaut with a broken spacecraft and no way back into space. It's the Paw Patrol to the rescue!".

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La Créature du lac / Collés ensemble) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La Créature du lac / Collés ensemble»A shipment of plastic is dumped in the Crystal Lake. A lake monster appears and Rammy must overcome his fear of rednessing everyone. When Lola and Mister Steel get stuck together, they are forced to work together.
